title: Inside Kim’s surprise birthday party
text:
Kim Kardashian’s 35th birthday: Kanye West threw her a surprise party Nadia Salemme News Corp Australia Network Kim Kardashian’s 35th birthday: Kanye West threw her a surprise party Nadia Salemme News Corp Australia Network Low-key birthday ... Kim Kardashian. Picture: Marc Piasecki/GC Images 
IT has been a tough time for the Kardashians lately but the family have turned out to celebrate Kim’s birthday. 
The heavily pregnant reality star turned 35, couple-dressing with her husband, Kanye West, while out in Los Angeles, both wearing nude and vanilla tones. 
West took Kim out to the movies and then surprised her with a party at Cinépolis Luxury Cinemas in Westlake, where guests watched Steve Jobs , E! reports. Baby bump ... Kim and Kanye dressed alike on Kim’s 35th birthday. Picture: Splash 
But missing from Kim’s birthday party were her sister, Khloe Kardashian, who is nursing her ex, Lamar Odom, through his recovery from an overdose at a Las Vegas brothel, and their reclusive brother, Rob, who is rarely seen in public. ‘Momager’ ... Kris Jenner and her boyfriend, Corey Gamble, carried gifts on their way to Kim’s party. Picture: Splash News 
It was a low-key celebration by Kardashian standards, in the wake of Odom’s ill-health, and came as Khloe reportedly called off finalising the former couple’s divorce . Birthday girl ... Kim and Kanye are expecting baby No. 2. Picture: Splash News 
But Kim’s mother Kris Jenner, along with Caitlyn Jenner, and sisters Kourtney, Kendall and Kylie all turned out for Kim’s party. Other Stories
